text:
Hmm...
What do you do when you're busy, right?

Yeah! Chiyuki-san seems like she's
good at that kind of thing, so I wanted to ask!
Maybe try spacing out on purpose?

Try taking a deep breath and saying "booo" out loud,
sometimes it brings out ideas from different angles.

You might see someone's face and come up with a good plan,
...it just makes your mind feel calmer.

I see...!
I'll try it sometime, too!

Yeah,
The key is to say it out loud and close your eyes.
